GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Listen to the video of people talking about times in different countries and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
Hi Jane,
Did you know it’s Pete’s birthday next month? We’ve decided to give him a surprise birthday party. Would you like to come?
We’re going to have eighties|80s music, so if you’ve got any records, please bring them. Could you also bring some food with you?
It’s going to be at Alex's flat on 22nd. Please do come. It should be fun.
All the best,
Pippa.
